intro: Psychotria ledermannii var. ogoouensis, commonly known as the Ogoouensis Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to West Africa, particularly found in countries such as Gabon and Cameroon. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and produces clusters of small, white or pale yellow flowers. It is often found in moist, shaded habitats within tropical rainforests. The species is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphological features and potential ecological roles in its native environment.
